item.title: Build a Dashboard using R
item.description: About Chapter 9: Information Visualization covers the case study on Build a Dashboard using R. How to Cite Please cite this compendium as: Lamba, Manika & Madhusudhan, Margam. (2021). Build a Dashboard using R (Version 1.2). https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5203304 Contents The compendium contains the code associated with the case study. The flexboard_R.Rmd file contains the R code for the case study.
